text: is there anyone specialised in custom events listeners for HubSpot and gtm?

Hi!
Does anyone know if there is any way to count the number of paid owners using the API ? Thanks you :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello Team,
we developed a software and now we want to create with the API automatically invoices in HubSpot with the existing customers in HubSpot.
Is that possible with the api?
After that we want to send all invoices with api request automatically via email to the customer.
After that we want to debit invoices automatically by direct debit.
Is that possible with the api and how ?

Hi all, when properties are created via the API, what user is set for "Created by" ?
I had a client ask this, but it shows the name of a specific user. I would have expected "Integration" or some "API user" or something.

Our app use OAUTH, not the api key method
Hi all! Question: Do you know from which IP range HubSpot sends requets (custom script)?

Hi!
Is there any chance to pass cookie, or other identification to php API so after i create contacts thru server side, HubSpot can recognize the client journey which he made in client side!
For now everything i sent thru php api - have no link to client side data.
Can find any clue, is this possible or not.
I`m using this php client: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-php>
